name: Transaction.RefundRequestError
desc: The error codes for refund requests.

items.name: case duplicateRequest
items.desc: The App Store has already received a refund request for this in-app purchase.

items.name: var errorDescription: String?
items.desc: A description of the error, suitable for debugging.

items.name: var failureReason: String?
items.desc: A localized message describing the reason for the failure.

items.name: var helpAnchor: String?
items.desc: A message providing “help” text if the user requests help by pressing an alert panel help anchor button.

items.name: var recoverySuggestion: String?
items.desc: A message containing a suggestion for recovering from the error.
